segments.text: I'm looking at this kitchen, and my anxiety is really rising.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The most immediate thing that catches my eye is that shaky stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Its legs are splayed, and it looks like it could go over at any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on top is reaching for cookies, completely focused on his prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, encouraging this dangerous behavior.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman? She's just standing in an ever-growing puddle of water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a surge of anger at her complete lack of awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she realize the damage the water is doing to her home?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Or the danger her children are in, just a few feet away?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone is going to slip and fall, or that stool is definitely going to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating to watch such a preventable series of mishaps unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout at her to turn off the faucet and look around!
segments.speaker: PAR
